name: nocker-blog-demo
description: Dockerized Node.js + MongoDB demo app featuring a simple blog rest API
author: Wesley Costa

scripts.prestart: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm i; fi
scripts.start: npm run api:start & npm run web:dev
scripts.web:start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run -s web:serve || npm run -s web:dev
scripts.test: npm run start && mocha api.specs.js && npm run stop
